titleStmt.title: The experiences of God's gracious dealing with Mrs. Elizabeth White, late wife of Mr. Thomas White of Coldecot in the county of Bucks. / As they were written under her own hand, and found in her closet after her decease, she dying in child-bed, Decemb. 5. 1669.
titleStmt.author: White, Elizabeth, d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Sanders, One of His Majesties Printers,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
